DigiFi | New York City | Software Engineer & Sales | All Levels | 60K - 150K + equity | ONSITE | https://angel.co/digifi/jobs

DigiFi is an enterprise technology company located in New York City that provides decision process automation software to financial institutions around the world. We empower the automation of critical processes, including credit underwriting, fraud detection, acquisition marketing and account management.

We believe that intelligent automation is the future and our mission is to make complex decisions simple. Please visit https://digifi.io to learn more.
